name: Circle Around! Color Game
description:
Do you love action games? Circle Around! is a revolutionary action game for all ages. Jump ball to avoid bricks and blocks and beat all the records!

Simple, exciting gameplay will make your gaming experience fun and easy. Colors are changing from time to time so that you won't get bored.

Game features:
- Tap for a jump;
- Double-Tap for the long jump;
- Avoid bricks;
- Watch out the outer circle to see next level obstacles;
- Enjoy and have fun!
